{{ name.default_value }} is a PHP Laravel application with an AngularJS front end, built on AWS. The application functionality enables users to __.
 
**Key features**
 
  - Import bulk legacy data from Google Analytics 
  - Automatically import daily data from Google Analytics 
  - Display data in practical charts 
  - Filter data with date range and site/property
